Johnson and Johnson
Johnson & Johnson One Johnson & Johnson Plaza New Brunswick Middlesex XXX New Jersey 08933 United States
Founded in 1886 by brothers Robert Wood Johnson, James Wood Johnson, and Edward Mead Johnson in New Brunswick, New Jersey as a pharmaceuticals company. Donated money and pharmaceuticals to Galveston Hurricane victims in 1900.

Luftschiffbau Zeppelin
XXX Friedrichshafen XXX XXX XXX XXX Germany
Count Ferdinand von Zeppelin gathered his staff to begin the production of giant "flying boats" making the town of Friedrichshafen a D26major aviation center. In World War I, Germany was restricted from building airships and instead it wasn't until 1926 that the Count could continue his work to make air travel popular. The airships were made quite luxurious and were popular until the crash of the Hindenburg in 1937 and World War II which resulted in the destruction of Friedrichshafen. Luftschiffbau Zeppelin began to focus on other means of production such as containers for industry after 1950 and has recently begun the production of airships again.
